## ScrollbarPair class

Class for a pair of scrollbars. Horizontal and vertical.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ScrollbarPair 
```

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[isVisible()](./blockly.scrollbarpair_class.isvisible_1_method.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

If any of the scrollbars are visible. Non-paired scrollbars may disappear when they aren't needed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[resize()](./blockly.scrollbarpair_class.resize_1_method.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Recalculate both of the scrollbars' locations and lengths. Also reposition the corner rectangle.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[resizeContent(hostMetrics)](./blockly.scrollbarpair_class.resizecontent_1_method.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Recalculates the scrollbars' locations within their path and length. This should be called when the contents of the workspace have changed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[resizeView(hostMetrics)](./blockly.scrollbarpair_class.resizeview_1_method.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Recalculates the scrollbars' locations on the screen and path length. This should be called when the layout or size of the window has changed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[set(x, y, updateMetrics)](./blockly.scrollbarpair_class.set_1_method.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Set the handles of both scrollbars.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>


</td><td>

</td></tr>

[setX(x)](./blockly.scrollbarpair_class.setx_1_method.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>
